cvextend Description¶

Functions¶

nested_cv(cv_grid, X, y, inner_cv_seeds[, …])

Run nested cross-validation.

basic_cv(cv_grid, X, y[, additional_info])

Run basic cross-validation.

generate_param_grid(steps, param_dict)

Generates sklearn.pipeline-compatible param_grid by permutation

Classes¶

ScoreGrid([score_selection])

Generates a ScoreGrid as required by cvextend.EvaluationGrid

EvaluationGrid(gridcv, score_grid)

A class that given a fitted sklearn.BaseSearchCV object returns the best estimator’s performance on a separate test set for each score.
